hero.title: Market Infrastructure for Brokers &
hero.description: ContiSX provides the liquidity, execution, and platform infrastructure that powers broker trading platforms, without being visible to end users.

landing.allShareDescription: The All-Share Index tracks the general market movement of all listed equities on Nigerian Exchange, including those listed on the Growth Board, regardless of capitalization.
landing.whatIsDescription: Everything you need to operate a world-class trading infrastructure
landing.theEngineDescription: Powers order execution, pricing, and settlement with institutional-grade precision and reliability.
landing.theMarketDescription: Connects brokers with dealers and institutions providing liquidity across multiple asset classes.
landing.infrastructureDescription: Enables brokers to deploy branded trading platforms without building from scratch.
landing.howContiSXDescription: A simple, transparent flow connecting market participants
landing.brokersConnectDescription: Brokers integrate with ContiSX infrastructure and launch their branded trading platforms.
landing.dealersProvideDescription: Dealers provide bids, asks, and market participation across broker platforms.
landing.tradersTradeDescription: End users trade on broker platforms. ContiSX remains invisible, powering everything behind the scenes.
landing.builtForBrokers: Built for Brokers, Dealers, and Markets
landing.complianceDescription: Built with institutional requirements at its core
landing.kycAmlDescription: Full compliance with know-your-customer and anti-money laundering requirements.
landing.auditFriendlyDescription: Transparent, auditable transaction and settlement records.
landing.transparentSettlementDescription: Clear, real-time settlement visibility for all participants.
landing.institutionalControlsDescription: Risk management and exposure controls for institutional participants.
landing.faqDescription: Contact us if you have any other questions.
landing.faq1Question: What is ContiSX and what does it provide?
landing.faq1Answer: ContiSX is a market infrastructure platform that enables brokers to deploy and operate trading platforms while connecting to institutional liquidity providers. It provides the underlying execution, liquidity, and operational foundation, while brokers retain full control over their brand, users, and business model.
landing.faq2Answer: Brokers, dealers, and institutions can use ContiSX to power their trading platforms and access aggregated liquidity.
landing.faq3Question: What trading services can brokers offer on ContiSX?
landing.faq3Answer: Brokers can offer a range of trading services across multiple asset classes backed by ContiSX execution and settlement infrastructure.
landing.faq4Question: Does ContiSX handle compliance and regulation?
landing.faq4Answer: ContiSX provides compliance-friendly tools and reporting to support KYC/AML and audit requirements, while brokers remain responsible for regulatory obligations in their jurisdictions.
landing.faq5Question: Is ContiSX visible to end users?
landing.faq5Answer: No — ContiSX operates invisibly behind broker-branded platforms, providing the backend execution and liquidity.
landing.stillHaveQuestion: Still have a question in mind?
landing.contactIfQuestions: Contact us if you have any other questions.
landing.ctaTitle: Start with the Role that Fits Your Institution

about.heroTitle: Building the invisible backbone of markets
about.heroDescription: Kaukus exists because the financial markets deserve infrastructure that works seamlessly behind the scenes—neutral, reliable, and built for everyone.
about.problemDescription: The financial markets are fragmented. Brokers face barriers to entry, compliance is a burden, and infrastructure is siloed.
about.fragmentationDescription: Multiple disconnected systems, incompatible platforms, and no unified infrastructure for trading.
about.complianceBurdenDescription: Brokers spend resources on compliance instead of innovation. Regulatory requirements are complex and costly.
about.highBarriersDescription: Starting a brokerage requires massive capital investment and technical expertise. Market entry is difficult.
about.ourSolutionDescription: Kaukus provides the complete infrastructure layer that brokers need to compete and thrive.
about.neutralInfrastructureDescription: We are not a broker. We are the infrastructure. Kaukus remains neutral, serving all market participants equally.
about.complianceFirstDescription: Compliance is built into the foundation, not bolted on. Brokers deploy with confidence in regulated markets.
about.invisibleInfrastructureDescription: Our infrastructure works seamlessly behind the scenes. Brokers focus on their business, not technology.
about.coreValuesDescription: Everything we build is guided by these principles.
about.neutralityDescription: We serve all market participants equally. No hidden advantages, no proprietary edge. Fair access for everyone.
about.reliabilityDescription: Markets depend on us. We maintain 99.99% uptime, robust infrastructure, and instant settlement.
about.transparencyDescription: All transactions, fees, and operations are transparent and auditable. No hidden costs or surprise changes.
about.innovationDescription: We continuously improve infrastructure to support new asset classes, trading models, and market opportunities.
about.complianceValueDescription: Regulatory requirements are not obstacles, they are features. We build compliance into everything.
about.simplicityDescription: Complex infrastructure should be invisible. Brokers deploy easily and focus on their business.
about.missionStatement: We envision a future where market infrastructure is accessible, fair, and invisible. Where brokers compete on service and innovation, not on technology. Where compliance is seamless. Where anyone with a great business idea can launch a trading platform.
about.missionTagline: Kaukus is building that future, one broker at a time.....

services.heroDescription: Kaukus enables brokers to deploy, operate, and scale trading platforms across multiple asset classes using a single, compliant market infrastructure.
services.baaSDescription: Broker-as-a-Service means Kaukus provides the core infrastructure required to operate a brokerage, while you control the brand, users, fees, and market offering.
services.whiteLabelDescription: Deploy branded trading interfaces without building from scratch.
services.scalableDescription: Add markets, regions, and products as you grow.
services.tradingServicesDescription: Kaukus allows brokers to selectively enable trading services based on their business model, regulatory scope, and target market.
services.stockTradingDescription: Immediate buying and selling of assets at current market prices.
services.derivativesTradingDescription: Derivatives allow traders to gain exposure to asset price movements without owning the underlying asset.
services.futuresTradingDescription: Contracts to buy or sell assets at a predetermined price on a future date.
services.privateMarketDescription: Immediate buying and selling of assets at current market prices.
services.howBrokersEnable: How Brokers Enable Services on Kaukus
services.servicesConfigurable: Services are fully configurable to your business model
services.step1Title: Apply and get approved as a broker
services.step1Description: Submit your application and complete KYC requirements.
services.step2Description: Choose from Stock, Futures, Options, or a combination.
services.step3Description: Customize the white-label interface with your brand.
services.step4Description: Launch your branded trading platform live.
services.step5Description: Operate your platform with full control and visibility.
services.complianceGovernanceDescription: Built with institutional requirements at its core

pricing.heroDescription: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include our core trading infrastructure and can be upgraded at any time.
pricing.starterDescription: Perfect for new brokers starting out
pricing.professionalDescription: For growing brokers with advanced needs
pricing.tradingProductsDescription: Select the trading products you want to offer to your users. Each product is priced separately.
pricing.faq1Question: What is included in the monthly fee?
pricing.faq1Answer: The monthly fee includes access to our trading infrastructure, selected templates, user management tools, and support. Trading volume fees are separate.
pricing.faq2Question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
pricing.faq2Answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. Your new features will be available immediately, and billing will be prorated.
pricing.faq3Question: What trading products can my users access?
pricing.faq3Answer: Depending on your plan, users can access Stock trading, Futures & Derivatives, Options, and Private Markets.
pricing.faq4Answer: Most brokers are live within 24-48 hours after approval. Our onboarding team will guide you through the process.
pricing.ctaDescription: Start your 14-day free trial today. No credit card required.

footer.description: Building the invisible backbone of markets. Institutional-grade infrastructure for brokers and dealers.

application.title: Broker Application
application.completeSteps: Complete all steps to submit your application
application.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: PDF, JPG, PNG. Max file size: 10MB per document.
application.bySubmitting: By submitting, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

requirements.title: Requirements & Specifications
requirements.description: Before applying, please ensure you meet the following requirements. This helps us process your application faster.
requirements.regulatoryLicenseDesc: Valid broker/dealer license from a recognized regulatory authority (SEC, FCA, ASIC, CySEC, etc.)
requirements.companyRegistrationDesc: Registered business entity with valid incorporation documents and tax identification.
requirements.capitalRequirementsDesc: Minimum $50,000 operational capital. Higher tiers available for increased trading limits.
requirements.complianceDocumentationDesc: AML/KYC policies, risk management procedures, and client fund segregation proof.
requirements.reviewTime: Application review typically takes 12-24 hours. You will receive an email notification once your application has been reviewed. Incomplete applications may take longer to process.
requirements.confirmRequirements: By continuing, you confirm that you meet the above requirements

awaitingApproval.congratulations: Congratulations! Your broker application has been approved.
awaitingApproval.beingReviewed: Your application is being reviewed. This typically takes 12-24 hours.
awaitingApproval.emailNotification: We'll send you an email notification once your application is approved.
